title: THAPOS - Game Changer for Athletes of All Major Sports
text:
Thapos launches online application for athletes of all major sports who are looking for the right tool to get better in sports. Thapos helps athletes improve their match performance, game skills and fitness by effectively managing their sporting life along with profile, schedule, athlete social network and much more.
San Ramon, CA (PRWEB) October 14, 2015
Thapos is now available for athletes of all major sports who are looking for the right tool to get better in sports. Thapos is an online application for athletes looking to gain a competitive advantage by effectively managing their sporting life. Thapos helps athletes improve their match performance, game skills and fitness. Athletes can also manage their profile, schedule, athlete social network and much more. Thapos gives coaches and parents the ability to help their athletes get better in sports. With this launch Thapos created a new space and starts a new era in youth sports.
A high school athlete intent on improving his or her game would come to Thapos to track progress and find areas of improvement and use the right drills to improve. The baseball pitcher trying to learn the new pitch, soccer player trying a new kick or the volleyball player looking to up their serve, all could come to Thapos to better themselves. A multi-sport athlete who is struggling to manage his or her schedule, could benefit by using Thapos's scheduling feature. Athletes can impress coaches and scouts with their Thapos profile which is easy to setup and manage. Athletes can build their athlete social network on Thapos with friends, coaches and teammates.
A parent or coach would gain a competitive edge for their athletes by using Thapos. A parent or coach can track and monitor an athlete's progress and use the right drills to get better, manage their athlete's schedule, profile and much more. Coaches can manage their teams on Thapos. Parents can manage their kids complete sporting life on Thapos.
Care to share those great scores or performances? Thapos social features allows you to quickly setup and update your profile with as much or little information as you would like. You can post pictures, videos, game results, statistics, all of which can be controlled with privacy settings.
Anyone looking to join a new club could easily use Thapos to find any and all local sporting organizations in their area.
Welcome to the new era of youth sporting.
Visit THAPOS today.
